titleStmt.title: The iust Italian Lately presented in the priuate house at Blacke Friers, by his Maiesties Seruants.
titleStmt.author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper for Iohn Waterson, and are to be sold at the signe of the Crowne, in Paules Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
